text: Ia oragh, kɨ datɨrɨghɨn overiam ko nguazimɨn diazɨ, aning orazi kɨ akar gavgavir kamɨn ia mɨgei. Ia Godɨn akam batogh egh deravɨra uari bagh gan. God bar zuamɨra nguazir kamɨn ia batuegham. Ia Jordanɨn Fanemɨn vongɨn nguazir ia datɨrɨghɨn iniamin kam, ia dughiar ruarimɨn an ikeghan kogham. Puvatɨgham. Ia bar moghɨrama arɨmɨghiregham.
